author: jeremy
msg: added @summary, using the value supplied by wi:hint to all <table>s output by this xslt for WAI compliance

author: jeremy
msg: changed wi:group[wi:styling/@type='fieldset'] to use the wi:hint for the @title of the <legend> instead of wi:help, as wi:help will often contain markup

author: jeremy
msg: improved vertical text alignment of label and field in @layout='columns' group

author: unico
msg: resolve forwardTo uri relative to cocoon:/ as it was previously
